doc.field: Incident action plans for Sept 2001-June 2002 (end of project). Powerpoint slides re: health & safety Issues at WTC (2002). Snapshots, looks like Spadafora visiting Kansas City, August 2002. Packet of material that relates at least in part to Spadafora's presentation at the Illinois Fire Chiefs Association (IFCA) in Waukegan, 2003, with Powerpoint slides re: WTC "FDNY: Facing Future Challenges with ICS" and WTC timeline, notes on McKinsey report, etc. Printout from web of McKinsey report "Increasing FDNY's Preparedness" (2002). Packet re: Spadafora's presentation at Mt. Sinai re: WTC health & safety (CD and slides) (2002). WTC damaged buildings grids. Certificate of appreciation from DoL for implementing the WTC emergency project environmental safety and health plan (2002). Binder of preparatory documents for the OSHA WTC Emergency Response Incident Critique held in June 2002 in Absecon, NJ. Snapshots (prints and on floppy and disks) of Ground Zero recovery (2002). Various print matter (some tearsheets, 9/11 commission report, Ground Zero book with inserts, FDNY "Helping America Cope" booklet). There is also one file related to the WTC Human Remains Recovery Project of 2006-07 with several incident action plans. (Includes digital formats)
